Rebellion painted to the life in three choice sermons upon the horrid murther of our gratious soveraign Charls the I. Of blessed memory. By Sam. Linch B.D. and preacher of Gods Word at Blackemore in Essex. Linch, Sam.
[8], 176 p.
printed for Robert Crofts at the Crowne in Chancery-lane, London : 1662.
Dedication signed: T.L. Each sermon has an added caption title. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

printed for Robert Crofts at the Crowne in Chancery-lane, London : 1662.
